description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Steve Smith - Developer Synthesist

ABSTRACT
Git is rapidly taking over the development workplace, and nowadays it is integrated with many development, testing and deployment platforms. But one of the downsides of high-level tools is that they can hide the details of what is happening under the hood. So when things [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/chicago-2016/presentation/Knowledge%20is%20Power:%20Getting%20out%20of%20trouble%20by%20understanding%20Git
